release.action: Remove child documents of deleted document from index and protocol it.
Improve import by filtering links when checking for coupled resources.
Do not write description for external coupled resources.
UVP: Optional indexing of negative preliminary examination which have a spatial reference
Handle default value of explanation field of conformity during import.
Do not show links of coupled service
Fix paging of HQL results
Make indexing more robust
Catch all errors in Communication
Fix value for isInspire of free conformity entries.
Fix iso export of 'Relative Pisitional Accuracy'
IGE: Fix order of opendata categories.
IGE: Download URL added twice to IDF in coupled data.
Portal: Zeige in Karte Link wird trotz Kennzeichnung "geschützter Dienst"
Add CI_OnLineFunctionCode handling in csw import
iPlug IDs can have capitalized letters now.
Retain hierarchy when importing CSW 2.0.2 documents.
Fix broken communication connection after IOException.
Improve isCSWDate function to better match ISO 8601
mCLOUD: map accrualPeriodicity with type keyword.
Add gmd:function for atom feed
Nokis: Map thesaurus to/from ISO
Map external coupled resources to operatesOn-Element
Nokis: Remove link information from coupled services.
Map column specification of dataformat
Remove "Identification of the data source" for copied objects
Fix ISO error when DOI is not complete
Fix upload cleanup job indexing issue.
Fix import of DCP-element
Update timespan ISO and remove 'am' time type.
Change 'Datengrundlage' Field from single entry to list.
Add explanation column to confirmity table.
Add data quality table 'Relative Positional Accuracy'
UVP: Fix display of categories in teaser.
Add display folder on portal catalog tree.
Clean up old indices after indexing.
Support localisation of fields.
Adapt namespace for igctx.
Import spatial scope value from CSW-ISO.
Improve import of operatesOn element.
Adapt storing of multiple grid axis elements.
Add new column to table t011_obj_geo_vector.
Change useConstraints export structure and fix import.
Update mapping of positionName.
Import/Export DoiType from ISO.
IGE (nokis): Only allow service and dataset for imports.
Add service links to Geodataset IDF from linked services.
IGE: Increase message size and timeout for IGE communication.
Fix UVP profile record mapping.
Change the docker container’s privilege to a non-root user.
Only add gmd:spatialRepresentationInfo elements if at least one field is supplied.
IGE: XML Namensraum "xs" fehlt in der ISO-Abbildung
Handle metadata date also for gco:DateTime nodes.
mCLOUD: Indexing Spatial-Data.
mCLOUD: Try-Catch Errors for Spatial-Mapping.
mCLOUD: Fix mcloud mapping to index, no IDF mapping.
Show correct version information in IGE
Handle new columns metadata_time and iso_hash in object.
Introduce Codeliste 5.24 MD_DimensionNameTypeCode.
Fix problem when no json exists in CL 6360.
Fix 5.2.0a strategie eingeführt mit #1274 (Konformitäten). Gilt nur für Updates von InGrid Versionen vor 5.2.0.
Introduce metadata point of contact address.
IGE: Optimize publish of one dataset.
Use connection pooling fo database access in whole import/export process.
Add indexes to table additional_field_data to increase statistics performance.
IGE: Nicht darzustellende Adressen werden trotzdem indexiert.
Verhalten der Felder zur "Datenqualität" ändern
Fix highlight summary by search query.
Import of license source note.
Fix import of name-format with gco:nilReason attr.
mCLOUD: Indexing mFUND-Fields
Import of axis description of grid format.
Import parent identifier from ISO XML
Control address overwrite on import per configuration.
Fix published dataset not showing up in portal.
Add default attribution to easily filter data in portal.
Change mapping of temporal field.
Modify links for uploaded documents in index
Profile for mCLOUD
UVP: Display of "Verfahrenstyp" in detail view.
WMTS via GetCapabilities-Assistant. Fix double entries in ISO.
Migrate ""encoding schema" to "application schema".
Change codelist namespace to http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml
IGE: INSPIRE TG MD 2.0: Normalize ISO-Mapping of "Nutzungsbedingungen" and "Anwendungseinschränkungen".
Add mapping for new column spatial_scope.
Add mapping for new table priority dataset.
BKG: Add Source Note to JSON in IDF.
Updated dependencies (utils).
BKG: Add JSON to IDF from codelist.
Fix index mapping of address (dates).
Import CRS from gmx:Anchor elements too.
UVP: Do not add hidden addresses to search result view.
Fix transformation of date fields to a format elastic understands.
Sometimes DB connection is lost during indexing.
Fix exporting not published service references.
IGE: Ein eingetragenes "gültig bis" Datum wirkt sich auf alle nachfolgenden Dokumente innerhalb der Dokumententabelle aus.
Sortierung nach Datum funktioniert nicht.
Fix extended search with URL as search term.
Fix facet mapping into index for topics.
BKG: Use gmx:Anchor element in CRS for INSPIRE datasets.
BKG: Use gmx-Anchor element for special use constraint.
BKG: Remove license entry for other use constraint.
Remove license entry for use constraint.
Update mapping.xls with "Quellenvermerk"
Store mod_time in index for later retrieval.
BAW: Fix metadata markers in map view
Use anchor element for access constraints if codelist value.
Use anchor element for use constraints if "no conditions apply".
Remove old Oracle JDBC lib to prevent conflict.
Regression: ParentIdentifier must not be shown for datasets under folders unless specified.
Fix import of AdV product group
Add central index functionality.
Remove codelist 6020.
Fix mapping of gmd:hoursOfService.
Make CSW-T import robuster.
Add docs for migrating from Oracle to MySQL (MetaVer).
Remove ISO themes from non Geo-Datasets.
Update Oracle driver to ojdbc7 for Oracle 12.
Fix indexing in wrong index.
Also add keyword advmis to index if adv checkbox selected so can be found in portal search.
Fix initial codelists (1320, 6005, 6100), data was lost when codelists were separated.
BKG: Fix import of useConstraints.
BKG: Fix import of useConstraints.
BKG: Remove praefix from useLimitation when exporting to ISO.
BKG: Import useConstraints to BKG specific field.
Free parentIdentifier in database.
Add source for a license in database. Make "accessConstraints" field optional.
Fix ISO mapping of "Raster/Gridformat".
UVP: Fix mapping for procedure 'negative Vorprüfungen'.
Fix postgres detection on english system.
Use latest codelists library to avoid missing codelists when migrating catalog.
UVP: Add new statistic request to get all published documents.
IGE: Add option to publish metadata at a later date. UVP: Add option to conditionally publish documents in Phase 1.
Fix postgres error when updating to 4.3.0 (in 4_3_0_b strategy).
Fix missing searchterm references after "Kein INSPIRE-Thema" has been removed.

Map new fields for conformity. Updated FAQs for finding out metadata-sets with missing publication dates at: http://www.ingrid-oss.eu/4.3.0/components/ige.html#wie-kann-ich-metadatensätze-mit-fehlender-datumsangabe-für-die-konformität-ermitteln-
UVP: Add configuration to be able to set a base url for the external access to the document store.
Map new fields for spatial representation info.
Map id of gazetteer location to areaid in index if no ags/rs found, so spatial search via gazetteer works in portal.
IDF: Only map child addresses with same or wider Publication Condition (publish_id).
IGE: Only use lowercase index fields while indexing to avoid problems with search.
IGE: Wait for indexing to finish before writing the plug description file so that all index fields are available for search.
Add multiple data languages (migrate to new table, import/export, idf, ...)
Syslist 6010 (accessConstraints) moved to codelist-repo, not editable anymore.
ISO import of multiple time-periods now possible (MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode), last one wins.
Support schema in database connection when indexing and when editing over all supported databases.
Fix transaction handling and Import/CSW-T.
Fix inheritance of address to sub addresses.
Fixed mapping of administrative area to correct position in ISO.
BKG: Fixed mapping of of codelist for use constraint and added label as prefix.
BKG: Fixed showing JSON is ISO document.
BKG: Added special version for input of access- and useConstraints to BKG profile.
UVP: Added UVP functionality (audit service, new checkbox needsExamination, input of date, ...)
Mapping of GEMET keywords to IDF, update thesaurusName and add additional english localization if configured.
Add setting on admin GUI to disable IGE iBus communication. Just use iPlug for indexing catalog.
Add language info to IDF if AdV compatible.
Support new fields adv_compatible, administrative_area and inspire_conform.
Added table adv_product_group and import/export functionality.
Adapt schema location, codelists to current INSPIRE specs when writing IDF.
Add new lines for multiple lineage fields during import.
Fix ISO import of geographicElement.
Import useLimitation and useConstraints according to GDI-DE conventions.
Remove GDI-DE prefix from useLimitation and useConstraints during ISO import.
Fixed ISO import of incomplete addresses, now persisted as working version.
Fixed insertion of published documents under folders.
Fixed clearing of additional fields after they have been published.
Added support for PostgreSQL. Full support in installer (create empty catalog) or migration via tool (see docs in conf/sql).
Added support for folders.
Fix: Delete/Update constraints does not recognize CSW ISO Core queriable "identifier".
Fixed CSW-T error when referenced address is a system user.
Fixed import of exported IGC documents (check for existance and update functionality).
Fixed wrong conversion of date to ISO format.
Map field explanation of conformity.
Added description of preview image.
Added option to reset the admin password with start script.
Import supports now additional fields mapping.
Persist new field "gridPosAccuracy" and handle import.
Map "Veröffentlichung" to same index field in objects/addresses (""publish_id") so query constraint in iPlug is possible.
Adapted sort order of CRS during ISO export.
Introduce metadata column to save date when expiry mail was sent to sent expiry emails in intervals.
Return info of imported objects/adresses for indexing immediately after import.
Fix import of top nodes via IGE frontend.
Fix problem with deleting objects via CSW-T that have no ORIG_UUID set and are linked by other objects.
Add new fields "Vorschaugrafik" / "Dateibeschreibung" to profile to appear in "additional fields" in frontend.
Fix update process of iPlug. The installer tried to access a file after moving it to the destination.
Fix problem with deriving address structure from one ISO address record (organization and individualName). Instead use free address type for ISO addresses with individual name set.
Fixed wrong path to save data when using cygwin.
Set correct iPlug class in plugdescription, which is needed to show correct version in ibus.
Fixed import of data basis field in ISO document.
Add new field/column to address "Hours of Service".
Always write categories even if checkbox for open data is deselected (for LGV Hamburg).
Fix Import of open data categories and env topics.
Make database connection pooling more robust with upgrade of c3p0 library.
Fixed insert/delete from index after CSW-T operation.
Fix wrong date in IDF if date is before introduction of daylight saving time.
Fix index mapping: Use ISO codes for field 't011_obj_serv.type' instead of IGE display value.
An object could not be inserted under another object via CSW-T.
Give addresses a lower score when searching to priorize objects.
Deletion of multiple objects via CSW-T is not possible.
Show correct number of results in summary of CSW-Transaction.
Do not cache CSW-T-Requests.
First version of CSW-T interface.
Added indexing of object and addresses as well as live updating index after publish.
Show detailed process during indexing.
Index/IDF: Create IDF details while indexing and add it to index document. Use IDF from index document if exists.
IDF: During mapping log problems transforming syslist entries with debug to avoid lots of irrelevant error output.

IDF: Add "Nutzungseinschränkungen: " / "Nutzungsbedingungen: " pre text to useLimitation / useConstraints (otherConstraints) according to GDI-DE. Make "Anwendungseinschränkungen" (useLimitation) always optional.
Index: Fix mapping of UUIDs in index, now all fields containing UUIDs are not analyzed.
IDF: Remove second identificationInfo element.
IDF: Write distributionInfo/*/linkage now for all service types, not only for view services.
IDF: Fix mapping of conformity according to GDI-DE.
Fix redirect to welcome page.
Admin-GUI: Correctly store database configuration.
Fixed cache problem when requesting syslist depending on a language.
IDF: Fixed mapping of null date.
Create new object in index now synchronized to avoid duplicates.
Add new field "Nutzungsbeschränkungen" to profile to appear in "additional fields".
Edit service version via selectbox and new syslist (according to GDI-DE content).
Add separate table for adding ISO useConstraints ("Nutzungsbeschränkungen"). Migrate licenses from table "Nutzungsbedingungen".
Migrate INSPIRE themes searchterms due to update of according syslist (6100). Map INSPIRE themes to ISO Categories according to GDI-DE and add missing ISO categories to records.
Geo-Dataset/-Service: Separate namespace and resource identifier with "/" instead of "#".
Remove PortalU-references during import/export.
Make iPlug work without internet connection, remove reference to external DTD from spring files.
Receive URL analysis as packages to prevent error due to too big message size in communication.
Fix MySQL to Oracle migration script (change datatype of URLs so IGE url check works).
Added license header to all source files for Open Source migration.
New behaviour when updating SNS spatial references, can be split now into multiple successors.
Added new iso entries to syslists accessConstraints (List-ID 6010) + useConstraints (List-ID 6020).
Compatibility wth Java 8.
Increase size of operation url in catalog (t011_obj_serv_op_connpoint.connect_point).
Fix Export if metadata to object/address is missing ("missing" content in catalog).
Check for invalid getCapabilities and possibility to replace them.
Increase database size of "Zugangsbeschränkungen".
Added ATOM Download service functionality.
Fixed bug when reindexing catalog contents, caused error.
Added datatype for url references.
Added overview of published objects on user entry page (dashboard).
Added "Open Data" checkbox indicating Open Data metadata + Open Data Categories + different syslist for use constraints.
On import exception also pass full stack trace to frontend.
Export of object/address comments fixed, content and creation date was missing.
Do NOT copy original id of object/address when performing copy.
Add new field "publication condition" for addresses.
Dashboard: Show edited objects/addresses of ALL USERS (also with permissions).
Now possible to take over address data of parent address to all subnodes.
Syslist table extended with data-column to store additional information.
Rework of Export/Import, now also includes working copies to be used as backup tool. Changed import behaviour.
Remove field "note" from addresses (t02_address.descr), contents moved to address comments -> NEW version 3.3.0 of Export/Import format !
Map ISO-topics from parent to new object.
Transform deleted entries of syslists to free entries when reindexing syslists.
Fix multiple references between same objects.
Fix multiple references to same object.
Added functionality for creating/updating IGC catalog via installer (udk-importer integrated) !
Prototype: added new object class "Open Data" (7) for demonstrating reduced data input (HH).
Add coupling type for service objects.
Handle migrated user addresses to separate hidden addresses not visible in IGE (adapt Queries/HQL).
Add publication condition to tree nodes for display in frontend.
Add new field hide-address to address data. Also part of InGrid Import/Export Format.
Add new field catalog-namespace to catalog data.

Add new legacy control "Datensammlung/Datenbank - Fachbezug - Objektartenkatalog". Synonym to "Geoinformation/Karte - Schlüsselkatalog" now both stored in the same new database table (object_types_catalogue).
Original object identifier now transfered to frontend to show in detail/compare view.
Rework of "Add/Edit Operation" dialog: Add syslist for operation platforms.
Rework of "Add/Edit Link" dialog: Remove columns from t017_url_ref, remove syslist 2240 (url datatype).
Introduce new names for relation to address. Also change behaviour: only one referenced address necessary, no matter which reference type.
Remove DQ tables "Art der Messung" syslists 7110 (Datendefizit), 7117 (Absolute Positionsgenauigkeit) now replaced by fields.

New comboboxes / syslists for "Availability - Usage Limitations" and "Conformity - Specification of Conformity", free entries can be converted to syslist. Handle metadata in syslist entries (e.g. in syslist 6005 publication date at end of values only used for IDF mapping).
Remove environmental categories from catalog (t0114_env_category + syslist 1400). Categorization now only via environmental topics.
Updated start.sh, which had an issue when being batch-invoked, deleted RSYNC which is no longer used.
Make HQL query in research more robust, now ObjectNode and AddressNode in one query possible.
Fix export of syslist if syslist entries are ordered by line attribute in database.
ORACLE fixes: Fix fetching of sys_generic_key value (no distinct).
Changed logging behavior, so that not so many files will be created.
Allow multiple spatial systems ("Raumbezugssystem"), now 1:n association.
Import/Export: Fix handling of "Raumbezugssystem", now exported/imported for all classes and moved to "spatial-domain" in Import/Export format (new format 3.0.1).
Import: Fix import of resolution-scan.
Allow free entries in fields "Zugangsbeschränkungen", "Höhe Vertikaldatum", "Raumbezugssystem" and "Kodierungsschema der geographischen Daten".
New checkbox "INSPIRE-relevanter Datensatz" for GEOINFORMATION/KARTE(class 1)) and GEODATENDIENST(class 3).
InGrid 3.0.0: Introduce flexible datamodel and IGC Profile.
More robust reading special characters during import ("unescaping" of xml text due to "escaping" in IDF Format).
When publishing object all referenced addresses now have to be published !
Fix write-subtree permission (DUMMY_WRITE_SUBTREE) passed to frontend if write-tree not possible due to missing QA permission on entity.

release.description: Release multiple groups per user, new write permission ... ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGC Schema (2.3.1.1) AND PORTAL !
release.action: Add new permission "write-subnode" for creating direct subnode and then nodes underneath created subnode (IGC Schema 2.3.1.1).
Introduce MULTIPLE GROUPS per User (IGC Schema 2.3.1.1).
Fix move of unpublished address under unpublished parent (before parent always had to be published).
Fix bug with removing duplicates from object address relations during address replacement.

release.description: Release InGrid 2.3 static changes (version adapted to InGrid version). ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGC Schema (2.3.0) AND PORTAL !
release.action: InGrid 2.3: Introduce input of INSPIRE Encoding (data format) (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
InGrid 2.3: Introduce input of Data Quality in "Geoinformation/Karte" (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
InGrid 2.3: Split object class "Dienst/Anwendung/Informationssystem" into classes "Geodatendienst" and "Informationssystem/Dienst/Anwendung" (IGC Schema 1.0.9).
InGrid 2.3: Separate "Access Constraints" and "Usage Limitations" into different tables (Trennung "Zugangsbeschränkungen" / "Nutzungsbedingungen") (IGC Schema 1.0.8).
Check Compatibility of schemes of "IGE-Frontend" / "IGE-iPlug" / "IGC Catalog". IGE-iPlug exits on startup if different schema than Catalog. Display of Errors in IGE entry page if schemes don't map.
Fix move of unpublished object under unpublished parent (before parent always had to be published).
Fix wrong wording of Service-Type and Service-Classification in export/import format (now vice versa).
IGE: Import von Daten zusätzlicher Felder katalogübergreifend möglich (Erkennung Feld via Name und Typ statt katalogspezifischer ID)
IGE: Import von Archivdateien
IGE: Erweiterte Protokollierung des Import Prozesses (Mapping)
IGE: Anpassung der Import-Oberfläche, Status-Anzeige

release.description: Oracle Release. ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGC Schema to 1.0.7
release.action: Neueste Projektabhängigkeiten, Einbindung in Upgrade Server.
Oracle support added. NOTICE: Schema of IGC has to be updated to 1.0.7 (via UDK Importer/Updater Strategy 1.0.7)
IGE Import: Better info when tags are missing. Better Info about Exceptions in JobProtocol.
Gesamtkatalogmanagement/Codelistenpflege/Reindexierung funktioniert wieder, generisches T01Object Dao hat gefehlt (noetig nachdem Sprach/Laenderlisten in Objekt integriert wurden)
Installationsassistent und Maven2 Kompatibilität, IGC version 1.0.5 / Export Format 1.0.5
Import-Export als Submodul integriert
erste Distribution des IGE-iPlug basierend auf IGC version 1.0.5 / Export Format 1.0.5
Integration Codelisten für Länder und Sprachen
SNS Update: Raumbezüge werden jetzt auch auf Name, etc. verglichen und ändern evtl. Topic-ID
Freier Raumbezug aus Sysliste nicht wiederholt speicherbar (verursachte NPE)
Export schreibt leere Export-Info wenn keine Objekte gefunden
Änderung Namensgebung in communication (Gruppe, iBus, iBus-Client)
Freie Raumbezüge/Freie Suchbegriffe: Speichervorgang robuster (exakter Namensvergleich, typenspezifisch etc.)
"Adresse löschen" berücksichtigt jetzt auch Mehrfachzuweisung von gleicher Adresse
erste Release Installation des IGE iPlug (MDEK) basierend auf IGC Katalog version 1.0.4 (Installation auf Kst-Servern, KEINE Distribution)
Initial installation of IGE iPlug (MDEK) covering IGC version 1.0.3 (INSPIRE etc.)
